mariana_snailfish.name: Mariana Snailfish
mariana_snailfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Mariana Snailfish. I am the deepest swimming fish in the whole ocean! I look like a pink tadpole.

giant_tube_worm.name: Giant Tube Worm
giant_tube_worm.simple: [excited] I'm a Giant Tube Worm. I have no mouth and no tummy! I live near hot underwater volcanoes.

comb_jelly.name: Comb Jelly
comb_jelly.simple: [curious] I'm a Comb Jelly. I don't sting like a jellyfish.

deep_sea_cucumber.name: Deep Sea Cucumber
deep_sea_cucumber.simple: [excited] I'm a Deep Sea Cucumber. I crawl on the bottom of the ocean and eat the sand to clean it.

zombie_worm.name: Zombie Worm
zombie_worm.simple: [curious] I'm a Zombie Worm. I don't eat brains! I like to eat old bones I find on the sea floor.

ping_pong_tree_sponge.name: Ping Pong Tree Sponge
ping_pong_tree_sponge.simple: [curious] I'm a Ping Pong Tree Sponge. I look like a weird tree with ping pong balls for leaves.

tripod_fish.name: Tripod Fish
tripod_fish.simple: [curious] I'm a Tripod Fish. I have three long stilts that let me stand on the mud without sinking.

dumbo_octopus.name: Dumbo Octopus
dumbo_octopus.simple: [excited] I'm a Dumbo Octopus. I flap my ear-fins to fly through the water like a cartoon elephant.

faceless_cusk.name: Faceless Cusk
faceless_cusk.simple: [curious] I'm a Faceless Cusk. I have no face! My mouth is underneath my head so I can scoop up food.

abyssal_spiderfish.name: Abyssal Spiderfish
abyssal_spiderfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm an Abyssal Spiderfish. I have super long fins that feel the water like spider legs.

sea_pig.name: Sea Pig
sea_pig.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sea Pig. I am a squishy pink tube with little legs.

ghost_shark.name: Ghost Shark
ghost_shark.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Ghost Shark. I am also called a Chimaera.

deep_sea_amphipod.name: Deep Sea Amphipod
deep_sea_amphipod.simple: [curious] I'm a Deep Sea Amphipod. I am a giant version of a sand flea.

glass_sponge.name: Glass Sponge
glass_sponge.simple: [excited] I'm a Glass Sponge. My body is made of silica, which is the same stuff as glass windows.

grenadier_fish.name: Grenadier Fish
grenadier_fish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Grenadier Fish. People call me a Rat-tail because my body tapers off into a long point.

cusk_eel.name: Cusk Eel
cusk_eel.simple: [curious] I'm a Cusk Eel. I am not a real eel, but I am very wiggly and slippery.

snipe_eel.name: Snipe Eel
snipe_eel.simple: [curious] I'm a Snipe Eel. My jaws curve away from each other so I can't close my mouth.

sea_angel.name: Sea Angel
sea_angel.simple: [curious] I'm a Sea Angel. I am a swimming slug with little wings that make me look like an angel.

deep_sea_jellyfish.name: Deep Sea Jellyfish
deep_sea_jellyfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Deep Sea Jellyfish. I glow red in the dark, which makes me invisible to other fish.

basket_star.name: Basket Star
basket_star.simple: [excited] I'm a Basket Star. I look like a mess of tangled tree roots wiggling in the water.

brisingid_starfish.name: Brisingid Starfish
brisingid_starfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Brisingid Starfish. I have so many arms! I raise them up to catch food falling from above.

sea_pen.name: Sea Pen
sea_pen.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sea Pen. I look like an old-fashioned feather pen stuck in the sand.

acorn_worm.name: Acorn Worm
acorn_worm.simple: [thoughtful] I'm an Acorn Worm. I smell like medicine (iodine) to stop fish from eating me.

monophore.name: Monophore
monophore.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Monophore. monophores are strange deep sea creatures that filter food from the water using tentacles.

siphonophore.name: Siphonophore
siphonophore.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Siphonophore. I am not one animal, but thousands of tiny clones holding hands.

black_swallower.name: Black Swallower
black_swallower.simple: [curious] I'm a Black Swallower. I have a stretchy tummy that can hold a fish twice my size.

lizardfish.name: Lizardfish
lizardfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Lizardfish. I have rows of sharp teeth, even on my tongue.

spookfish.name: Spookfish
spookfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Spookfish. My head is see-through and my eyes can look up and down at the same time.

anglerfish.name: Anglerfish
anglerfish.simple: [curious] I'm an Anglerfish. I have a fishing pole on my head with a glowing light to catch yummy fish.

vampire_squid.name: Vampire Squid
vampire_squid.simple: [curious] I'm a Vampire Squid. I wrap my red cape around myself when I am scared.

giant_squid.name: Giant Squid
giant_squid.simple: [curious] I'm a Giant Squid. My eye is as big as a dinner plate! I battle sperm whales.

gulper_eel.name: Gulper Eel
gulper_eel.simple: [excited] I'm a Gulper Eel. My mouth is huge like a pelican! I can swallow things bigger than me.

goblin_shark.name: Goblin Shark
goblin_shark.simple: [excited] I'm a Goblin Shark. I can shoot my jaw out of my face to grab a snack.

blobfish.name: Blobfish
blobfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Blobfish. I look sad and squishy because I have no muscles.

lanternfish.name: Lanternfish
lanternfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Lanternfish. I have tiny lights all over my belly.

hatchetfish.name: Hatchetfish
hatchetfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Hatchetfish. I am as thin as a coin and look like a silver hatchet.

viperfish.name: Viperfish
viperfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Viperfish. My teeth are so long they curve over my face like a cage.

dragonfish.name: Dragonfish
dragonfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Dragonfish. I look scary, but I am very small—only the size of a banana.

fangtooth.name: Fangtooth
fangtooth.simple: [excited] I'm a Fangtooth. I have the biggest teeth compared to my body size of any fish.

frilled_shark.name: Frilled Shark
frilled_shark.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Frilled Shark. I look like an eel but I am a shark with 300 needle teeth.

coffinfish.name: Coffinfish
coffinfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Coffinfish. I can puff up like a balloon and hold my breath to look big.

barreleye.name: Barreleye
barreleye.simple: [excited] I'm a Barreleye. My head is a clear bubble! The green balls inside are my eyes.

cookiecutter_shark.name: Cookiecutter Shark
cookiecutter_shark.simple: [curious] I'm a Cookiecutter Shark. I am small, but I take round bites out of big whales like a cookie cutter.

oarfish.name: Oarfish
oarfish.simple: [excited] I'm an Oarfish. I am the longest bony fish in the world.

big_red_jelly.name: Big Red Jelly
big_red_jelly.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Big Red Jelly. I am a giant red jellyfish that doesn't have stinging tentacles.

colossal_squid.name: Colossal Squid
colossal_squid.simple: [curious] I'm a Colossal Squid. I am heavier than the Giant Squid and have spinning hooks on my arms.

six_gill_shark.name: Six-Gill Shark
six_gill_shark.simple: [curious] I'm a Six-Gill Shark. Most sharks have 5 gills, but I have 6! I move very slowly.

wolffish.name: Wolffish
wolffish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Wolffish. I have strong teeth to crush seashells.

chimaera.name: Chimaera
chimaera.simple: [excited] I'm a Chimaera. I have a venomous spine on my back and fly through the water.

stoplight_loosejaw.name: Stoplight Loosejaw
stoplight_loosejaw.simple: [curious] I'm a Stoplight Loosejaw. I have a red light under my eye like a stoplight.

flashlight_fish.name: Flashlight Fish
flashlight_fish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Flashlight Fish. I have a pocket of glowing light under my eye that I can blink on and off.

japanese_spider_crab.name: Japanese Spider Crab
japanese_spider_crab.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Japanese Spider Crab. I have the longest legs of any crab.

nautilus.name: Nautilus
nautilus.simple: [curious] I'm a Nautilus. I live in a beautiful spiral shell and swim backwards.

sperm_whale.name: Sperm Whale
sperm_whale.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sperm Whale. I have the biggest brain of any animal and I dive super deep.

beaked_whale.name: Beaked Whale
beaked_whale.simple: [excited] I'm a Beaked Whale. I look like a dolphin but I have a beak like a goose.

elephant_seal.name: Elephant Seal
elephant_seal.simple: [curious] I'm an Elephant Seal. My nose looks like an elephant trunk! I make loud roaring noises.

clownfish.name: Clownfish
clownfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Clownfish. I are all born male and the largest one will turn into a female.

blue_tang.name: Blue Tang
blue_tang.simple: [curious] I'm a Blue Tang. Blue tangs can change color based on their mood - they get darker at night.

parrotfish.name: Parrotfish
parrotfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Parrotfish. I sleep in a bubble of their own mucus to hide their scent from predators.

lionfish.name: Lionfish
lionfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Lionfish. I have venomous spines that can cause painful stings to humans.

seahorse.name: Seahorse
seahorse.simple: [curious] I'm a Seahorse. Seahorses are the only animals where males get pregnant and give birth.

moray_eel.name: Moray Eel
moray_eel.simple: [curious] I'm a Moray Eel. Moray eels have a second set of jaws in their throat that grab prey and pull it down.

pufferfish.name: Pufferfish
pufferfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Pufferfish. I contain a poison 1,200 times more deadly than cyanide.

butterflyfish.name: Butterflyfish
butterflyfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Butterflyfish. I mate for life and can be seen swimming in pairs.

angelfish.name: Angelfish
angelfish.simple: [curious] I'm an Angelfish. Young angelfish have different colors and patterns than adult angelfish.

sea_turtle.name: Sea Turtle
sea_turtle.simple: [curious] I'm a Sea Turtle. Sea turtles can live over 100 years and return to the same beach where they were born to lay eggs.

reef_shark.name: Reef Shark
reef_shark.simple: [curious] I'm a Reef Shark. Reef sharks can rest while swimming by using their tails to push water over their gills.

manta_ray.name: Manta Ray
manta_ray.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Manta Ray. Manta rays have the largest brain of any fish and can recognize themselves in mirrors.

cuttlefish.name: Cuttlefish
cuttlefish.simple: [curious] I'm a Cuttlefish. I can change color and pattern in less than a second to communicate or hide.

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.simple: [excited] I'm an Octopus. Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.

giant_clam.name: Giant Clam
giant_clam.simple: [excited] I'm a Giant Clam. Giant clams can live over 100 years and can weigh up to 200 kilograms.

boxfish.name: Boxfish
boxfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Boxfish. I release a toxin when stressed that can kill other fish nearby.

triggerfish.name: Triggerfish
triggerfish.simple: [curious] I'm a Triggerfish. I can swim backward by using their second dorsal fin.

sea_anemone.name: Sea Anemone
sea_anemone.simple: [excited] I'm a Sea Anemone. Sea anemones can live for 50 years and some species can eat small fish.

mandarinfish.name: Mandarinfish
mandarinfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Mandarinfish. I are covered in a toxic mucus that protects them from predators.

moorish_idol.name: Moorish Idol
moorish_idol.simple: [excited] I'm a Moorish Idol. Moorish idols can change color when they sleep or get excited.

napoleon_wrasse.name: Napoleon Wrasse
napoleon_wrasse.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Napoleon Wrasse. I can live over 30 years and are one of the largest reef fish.

cleaner_shrimp.name: Cleaner Shrimp
cleaner_shrimp.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Cleaner Shrimp. I set up cleaning stations where fish line up to have parasites removed.

stonefish.name: Stonefish
stonefish.simple: [excited] I'm a Stonefish. I is the most venomous fish in the world and can be fatal to humans.

barracuda.name: Barracuda
barracuda.simple: [curious] I'm a Barracuda. Barracudas can swim up to 60 km/h and have been known to leap out of the water.

trumpetfish.name: Trumpetfish
trumpetfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Trumpetfish. I often swim vertically to blend in with sea fans and corals.

nudibranch.name: Nudibranch
nudibranch.simple: [excited] I'm a Nudibranch. Nudibranchs are sea slugs that come in thousands of bright colors and patterns.

sea_fan.name: Sea Fan
sea_fan.simple: [curious] I'm a Sea Fan. Sea fans are actually colonies of tiny animals that create a fan-shaped structure.

brain_coral.name: Brain Coral
brain_coral.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Brain Coral. Brain corals can live for over 900 years and grow very slowly.

bottlenose_dolphin.name: Bottlenose Dolphin
bottlenose_dolphin.simple: I'm a Bottlenose Dolphin. I talk to my friends using clicks and whistles underwater!

sea_otter.name: Sea Otter
sea_otter.simple: [curious] I'm a Sea Otter. Sea otters have the densest fur of any animal with up to 1 million hairs per square inch.

manatee.name: Manatee
manatee.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Manatee. Manatees are known as sea cows and eat up to 10% of their body weight daily.

stingray.name: Stingray
stingray.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Stingray. Stingrays have sensors on their faces that can detect the electrical fields of prey.

starfish.name: Starfish
starfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Starfish. I can regrow lost arms and some can even grow a whole new body from just one arm.

hermit_crab.name: Hermit Crab
hermit_crab.simple: [curious] I'm a Hermit Crab. Hermit crabs carry their homes on their backs and must find bigger shells as they grow.

lobster.name: Lobster
lobster.simple: [excited] I'm a Lobster. Lobsters can live over 100 years and don't show signs of aging.

sea_urchin.name: Sea Urchin
sea_urchin.simple: [excited] I'm a Sea Urchin. Sea urchins have teeth that grow continuously and are made of the hardest material in nature.

sand_dollar.name: Sand Dollar
sand_dollar.simple: [curious] I'm a Sand Dollar. Sand dollars are flattened sea urchins that use tiny spines to move and bury themselves.

pelican.name: Pelican
pelican.simple: [curious] I'm a Pelican. Pelicans can hold up to 11 liters of water in their throat pouch.

seagull.name: Seagull
seagull.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Seagull. seagulls can drink salt water because they have glands that remove the salt.

horseshoe_crab.name: Horseshoe Crab
horseshoe_crab.simple: [curious] I'm a Horseshoe Crab. Horseshoe crabs have been around for 450 million years, longer than dinosaurs.

fiddler_crab.name: Fiddler Crab
fiddler_crab.simple: [curious] I'm a Fiddler Crab. Male fiddler crabs have one giant claw they wave to attract females.

flounder.name: Flounder
flounder.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Flounder. I are born with eyes on both sides of their head, but one eye moves to the top as they grow.

barnacle.name: Barnacle
barnacle.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Barnacle. Barnacles stand on their heads and kick food into their mouth with their feet.

jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
jellyfish.simple: [excited] I'm a Jellyfish. I are 95% water and have been around for over 500 million years.

sea_lion.name: Sea Lion
sea_lion.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sea Lion. Sea lions can swim up to 40 km/h and can hold their breath for 20 minutes.

harbor_seal.name: Harbor Seal
harbor_seal.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Harbor Seal. Harbor seals can sleep underwater and surface automatically to breathe without waking up.

great_white_shark.name: Great White Shark
great_white_shark.simple: [curious] I'm a Great White Shark. Great white sharks can detect one drop of blood in 100 liters of water.

hammerhead_shark.name: Hammerhead Shark
hammerhead_shark.simple: [curious] I'm a Hammerhead Shark. Hammerhead sharks have eyes on the sides of their head, giving them 360-degree vision.

tiger_shark.name: Tiger Shark
tiger_shark.simple: [excited] I'm a Tiger Shark. Tiger sharks will eat anything - tires, license plates, and even suits of armor have been found in their stomachs.

sea_sponge.name: Sea Sponge
sea_sponge.simple: [excited] I'm a Sea Sponge. Sea sponges can filter their entire body volume in less than a minute.

scallop.name: Scallop
scallop.simple: [curious] I'm a Scallop. Scallops have dozens of eyes and can swim by clapping their shells together.

oyster.name: Oyster
oyster.simple: [curious] I'm an Oyster. Oysters can change their sex multiple times during their lifetime.

mussel.name: Mussel
mussel.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Mussel. Mussels produce byssal threads, often called 'beards', that are as strong as steel.

conch_snail.name: Conch Snail
conch_snail.simple: [excited] I'm a Conch Snail. Conch snails have eyes on stalks and can jump by using their foot like a spring.

krill.name: Krill
krill.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Krill. I are the most abundant animal species on Earth with a total weight of 500 million tons.

plankton.name: Plankton
plankton.simple: [excited] I'm a Plankton. I produce half of the oxygen we breathe.

cow.name: Cow
cow.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Cow. Cows have best friends and get stressed when they're separated.

pig.name: Pig
pig.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Pig. Pigs are smarter than dogs and can learn to play video games.

sheep.name: Sheep
sheep.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sheep. I can recognize up to 50 different human faces and remember them for years.

goat.name: Goat
goat.simple: [excited] I'm a Goat. Goats have accents - their bleats change depending on their social group.

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Chicken. Chickens have over 30 different vocalizations and can dream.

rooster.name: Rooster
rooster.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Rooster. Roosters can tell time and often crow just before sunrise.

duck.name: Duck
duck.simple: [curious] I'm a Duck. Ducklings will follow the first moving thing they see - even if it's not their mother.

goose.name: Goose
goose.simple: [excited] I'm a Goose. Geese mate for life and mourn their dead partners.

turkey.name: Turkey
turkey.simple: [excited] I'm a Turkey. Wild turkeys can fly up to 88 km/h but domestic turkeys can't fly.

horse.name: Horse
horse.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Horse. Horses can sleep standing up using a system of tendons and ligaments.

donkey.name: Donkey
donkey.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Donkey. donkeys have memories and can recognize places they haven't seen in 25 years.

pony.name: Pony
pony.simple: [excited] I'm a Pony. Ponies are stronger than horses relative to their size.

llama.name: Llama
llama.simple: [curious] I'm a Llama. Llamas can carry up to 30% of their body weight and will spit when angry.

alpaca.name: Alpaca
alpaca.simple: [excited] I'm an Alpaca. I fiber is fire-resistant and comes in 22 natural colors.

border_collie.name: Border Collie
border_collie.simple: [curious] I'm a Border Collie. Border collies are the smartest dog breed and can learn over 1,000 words.

golden_retriever.name: Golden Retriever
golden_retriever.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Golden Retriever. Golden retrievers have 'soft mouths' and can carry eggs without breaking them.

tabby_cat.name: Tabby Cat
tabby_cat.simple: [excited] I'm a Tabby Cat. Tabby cats have an M pattern on their forehead that's believed to be from Mohammed's blessing.

siamese_cat.name: Siamese Cat
siamese_cat.simple: [excited] I'm a Siamese Cat. Siamese cats are born white and develop their points as they get older.

goldfish.name: Goldfish
goldfish.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Goldfish. I can recognize faces and can be trained to push levers for food.

hamster.name: Hamster
hamster.simple: [curious] I'm a Hamster. Hamsters have pouches in their cheeks that can stretch to their shoulders.

guinea_pig.name: Guinea Pig
guinea_pig.simple: [excited] I'm a Guinea Pig. Guinea pigs can't make their own vitamin C and must get it from food.

rabbit.name: Rabbit
rabbit.simple: [excited] I'm a Rabbit. Rabbits can jump nearly 1 meter high and have 360-degree vision.

ferret.name: Ferret
ferret.simple: [curious] I'm a Ferret. Ferrets sleep up to 18 hours a day and are most active at dawn and dusk.

parakeet.name: Parakeet
parakeet.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Parakeet. Parakeets can learn over 100 words and live up to 20 years.

cockatiel.name: Cockatiel
cockatiel.simple: [excited] I'm a Cockatiel. Male cockatiels are better at talking and females are better at whistling.

turtle.name: Turtle
turtle.simple: [curious] I'm a Turtle. Turtles can breathe through their butt when underwater.

pot_bellied_pig.name: Pot-bellied Pig
pot_bellied_pig.simple: [excited] I'm a Pot-bellied Pig. Pot-bellied pigs can learn to use a litter box and respond to their name.

mule.name: Mule
mule.simple: [curious] I'm a Mule. Mules are smarter than horses and have better endurance than donkeys.

brown_bear.name: Brown Bear
brown_bear.simple: [excited] I'm a Brown Bear. Brown bears can run up to 48 km/h and eat up to 40 kg of food per day.

black_bear.name: Black Bear
black_bear.simple: [curious] I'm a Black Bear. Black bears can climb trees even as adults and are excellent swimmers.

moose.name: Moose
moose.simple: [excited] I'm a Moose. I antlers can grow up to 2 meters wide and fall off every winter.

elk.name: Elk
elk.simple: [excited] I'm an Elk. I can jump 2.

white_tailed_deer.name: White-Tailed Deer
white_tailed_deer.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a White-Tailed Deer. I can run up to 48 km/h and jump 3 meters high.

red_fox.name: Red Fox
red_fox.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Red Fox. Red foxes have 28 different calls and can hear a watch ticking from 40 meters away.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Wolf. Wolves can run for hours at 8 km/h and have 200 million scent cells.

coyote.name: Coyote
coyote.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Coyote. Coyotes can mate with dogs and wolves and can jump 4 meters high.

bobcat.name: Bobcat
bobcat.simple: [excited] I'm a Bobcat. Bobcats can leap 3 meters to catch prey and have excellent night vision.

lynx.name: Lynx
lynx.simple: [curious] I'm a Lynx. I have huge paws that work like snowshoes to help them walk on snow.

squirrel.name: Squirrel
squirrel.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Squirrel. Squirrels can find buried nuts under a foot of snow using their sense of smell.

chipmunk.name: Chipmunk
chipmunk.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Chipmunk. Chipmunks can carry food in their cheek pouches and store up to 8 kg of nuts for winter.

beaver.name: Beaver
beaver.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Beaver. Beavers can hold their breath for 15 minutes and their teeth never stop growing.

river_otter.name: River Otter
river_otter.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a River Otter. River otters have waterproof fur and can close their nostrils and ears underwater.

porcupine.name: Porcupine
porcupine.simple: [curious] I'm a Porcupine. Porcupines have up to 30,000 quills that they can shoot out when threatened.

skunk.name: Skunk
skunk.simple: [excited] I'm a Skunk. I spray can be detected up to 3.

badger.name: Badger
badger.simple: [excited] I'm a Badger. badgers can dig through concrete and their jaws can lock onto prey with force.

woodpecker.name: Woodpecker
woodpecker.simple: [excited] I'm a Woodpecker. Woodpeckers can peck 20 times per second and have shock-absorbing skulls.

blue_jay.name: Blue Jay
blue_jay.simple: [curious] I'm a Blue Jay. Blue jays can mimic hawk calls to scare other birds away from food.

cardinal.name: Cardinal
cardinal.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Cardinal. Cardinals don't molt their feathers so they stay bright red all year.

eagle.name: Eagle
eagle.simple: [curious] I'm an Eagle. Eagles can see 4-7 times better than humans and can spot a rabbit from 3 km away.

hawk.name: Hawk
hawk.simple: [excited] I'm a Hawk. Hawks can see in ultraviolet and track prey by following urine trails.

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.simple: [curious] I'm a Falcon. Peregrine falcons are the fastest animals, diving at over 320 km/h.

wild_boar.name: Wild Boar
wild_boar.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Wild Boar. Wild boars have tough skin that can stop arrows and they're excellent swimmers.

hedgehog.name: Hedgehog
hedgehog.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Hedgehog. Hedgehogs are immune to snake venom and can eat poisonous snakes.

mole.name: Mole
mole.simple: [curious] I'm a Mole. moles can dig 15 meters of tunnel per hour and have a thumb for digging.

salamander.name: Salamander
salamander.simple: [excited] I'm a Salamander. Some salamanders can regrow entire limbs, including bones, muscles, and nerves.

turkey_vulture.name: Turkey Vulture
turkey_vulture.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Turkey Vulture. Turkey vultures can eat diseased animals without getting sick and use vomit as defense.

bengal_tiger.name: Bengal Tiger
bengal_tiger.simple: [curious] I'm a Bengal Tiger. Tigers have stripes on their skin as well as their fur - no two tigers have the same pattern.

jaguar.name: Jaguar
jaguar.simple: [excited] I'm a Jaguar. Jaguars have the strongest bite of all big cats and can crush turtle shells.

leopard.name: Leopard
leopard.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Leopard. Leopards can carry prey 3 times their own weight up trees.

gorilla.name: Gorilla
gorilla.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Gorilla. Gorillas can learn sign language and have unique fingerprints like humans.

chimpanzee.name: Chimpanzee
chimpanzee.simple: [excited] I'm a Chimpanzee. Chimpanzees use tools, teach their young, and have been seen using medicine.

orangutan.name: Orangutan
orangutan.simple: [curious] I'm an Orangutan. Orangutans share 97% of DNA with humans and build nests in trees every night.

howler_monkey.name: Howler Monkey
howler_monkey.simple: [excited] I'm a Howler Monkey. Howler monkeys are the loudest land animals - their calls can be heard 5 km away.

spider_monkey.name: Spider Monkey
spider_monkey.simple: [curious] I'm a Spider Monkey. Spider monkeys have a prehensile tail that works like a fifth arm.

capuchin_monkey.name: Capuchin Monkey
capuchin_monkey.simple: [excited] I'm a Capuchin Monkey. Capuchin monkeys use tools to crack nuts and even use medicinal plants.

lemur.name: Lemur
lemur.simple: [curious] I'm a Lemur. Lemurs have long tails for balance and communicate with scent markings.

sloth.name: Sloth
sloth.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Sloth. Sloths are so slow that algae grows on their fur, helping them blend in.

anteater.name: Anteater
anteater.simple: [curious] I'm an Anteater. Anteaters can eat 35,000 ants per day and have a 60 cm long tongue.

armadillo.name: Armadillo
armadillo.simple: [excited] I'm an Armadillo. Armadillos can jump 1 meter high when startled and always have identical quadruplets.

tapir.name: Tapir
tapir.simple: [excited] I'm a Tapir. Tapirs are related to horses and rhinos and can use their nose as a snorkel.

toucan.name: Toucan
toucan.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Toucan. A toucan's bill is one-third of its body length but is so light it can't affect balance.

macaw.name: Macaw
macaw.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Macaw. Macaws can live over 80 years and mate for life.

parrot.name: Parrot
parrot.simple: [excited] I'm a Parrot. Some parrots can live over 100 years and learn over 100 words.

hummingbird.name: Hummingbird
hummingbird.simple: [excited] I'm a Hummingbird. Hummingbirds beat their wings 80 times per second and are the only birds that can fly backward.

green_iguana.name: Green Iguana
green_iguana.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Green Iguana. Iguanas can hold their breath for 30 minutes and have a third eye on top of their head.

chameleon.name: Chameleon
chameleon.simple: [excited] I'm a Chameleon. Chameleons change color based on mood and temperature, not just camouflage.

boa_constrictor.name: Boa Constrictor
boa_constrictor.simple: [curious] I'm a Boa Constrictor. Boa constrictors have heat-sensing pits and can swallow prey larger than their head.

python.name: Python
python.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Python. Pythons can go a year without eating and have flexible jaws that unhinge to swallow large prey.

anaconda.name: Anaconda
anaconda.simple: [thoughtful] I'm an Anaconda. Anacondas give birth to live young and can stay underwater for 10 minutes.

poison_dart_frog.name: Poison Dart Frog
poison_dart_frog.simple: [excited] I'm a Poison Dart Frog. One golden poison dart frog has enough poison to kill 10 humans.

red_eyed_tree_frog.name: Red-Eyed Tree Frog
red_eyed_tree_frog.simple: [excited] I'm a Red-Eyed Tree Frog. Red-eyed tree frogs flash their bright colors to startle predators, then escape.

tarantula.name: Tarantula
tarantula.simple: [curious] I'm a Tarantula. Tarantulas can regenerate lost legs and some species can live 30 years.

leafcutter_ant.name: Leafcutter Ant
leafcutter_ant.simple: [excited] I'm a Leafcutter Ant. Leafcutter ants don't eat leaves - they use them to grow fungus that they eat.

okapi.name: Okapi
okapi.simple: [excited] I'm an Okapi. Okapis are the only living relatives of giraffes and have zebra-striped legs.

barn_owl.name: Barn Owl
barn_owl.simple: [curious] I'm a Barn Owl. Barn owls have asymmetrical ears that help them pinpoint sounds in complete darkness.

great_horned_owl.name: Great Horned Owl
great_horned_owl.simple: [excited] I'm a Great Horned Owl. Great horned owls can't move their eyes, so they can turn their heads 270 degrees.

fruit_bat.name: Fruit Bat
fruit_bat.simple: [curious] I'm a Fruit Bat. Fruit bats are essential pollinators for over 300 plant species.

vampire_bat.name: Vampire Bat
vampire_bat.simple: [excited] I'm a Vampire Bat. Vampire bats can walk, run, and jump and share blood with other bats who couldn't find food.

raccoon.name: Raccoon
raccoon.simple: [curious] I'm a Raccoon. Raccoons have 'hands' with five fingers and can remember solutions to tasks for 3 years.

opossum.name: Opossum
opossum.simple: [excited] I'm an Opossum. Opossums play dead when threatened and can have up to 20 babies at once.

aye_aye.name: Aye-Aye
aye_aye.simple: [excited] I'm an Aye-Aye. Aye-ayes have a long middle finger they use to tap on wood and find insects.

tarsier.name: Tarsier
tarsier.simple: [curious] I'm a Tarsier. Tarsiers have the largest eyes relative to body size of any mammal.

bush_baby.name: Bush Baby
bush_baby.simple: [excited] I'm a Bush Baby. Bush babies can leap 2.

sugar_glider.name: Sugar Glider
sugar_glider.simple: [curious] I'm a Sugar Glider. Sugar gliders can glide up to 45 meters using a membrane between their legs.

kinkajou.name: Kinkajou
kinkajou.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Kinkajou. Kinkajous have a 5-inch long tongue they use to reach nectar in flowers.

fennec_fox.name: Fennec Fox
fennec_fox.simple: [excited] I'm a Fennec Fox. Fennec foxes have huge ears that help them hear prey underground and release heat.

hyena.name: Hyena
hyena.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Hyena. Hyenas are more closely related to cats than dogs and can digest bones completely.

aardvark.name: Aardvark
aardvark.simple: [excited] I'm an Aardvark. Aardvarks can dig 1 meter in 5 minutes and eat 50,000 termites per night.

pangolin.name: Pangolin
pangolin.simple: [excited] I'm a Pangolin. Pangolins are the only mammals covered in scales and can roll into a ball for protection.

tasmanian_devil.name: Tasmanian Devil
tasmanian_devil.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Tasmanian Devil. Tasmanian devils have the strongest bite relative to body size of any mammal.

wombat.name: Wombat
wombat.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Wombat. Wombats have cube-shaped poop that doesn't roll away and they use it to mark territory.

koala.name: Koala
koala.simple: [excited] I'm a Koala. Koalas sleep 22 hours a day and have fingerprints almost identical to humans.

scorpion.name: Scorpion
scorpion.simple: [excited] I'm a Scorpion. Scorpions glow under UV light and can survive a year without food.

firefly.name: Firefly
firefly.simple: [curious] I'm a Firefly. Fireflies flash in patterns to attract mates and some synchronize their flashes.

moth.name: Moth
moth.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Moth. Moths navigate by the moon and some can fly up to 60 km/h.

gecko.name: Gecko
gecko.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Gecko. Geckos can walk on walls using microscopic hairs that create molecular attraction.

cacomistle.name: Cacomistle
cacomistle.simple: [excited] I'm a Cacomistle. Cacomistles are related to raccoons and have rings on their tails like raccoons.

civet.name: Civet
civet.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Civet. Civets produce musk used in perfumes and some coffee beans pass through them.

genet.name: Genet
genet.simple: [curious] I'm a Genet. Genets can stand on their hind legs to look around and have retractable claws like cats.

mouse.name: Mouse
mouse.simple: [excited] I'm a Mouse. Mice can squeeze through holes as small as a pencil and have ultrasonic hearing.

rat.name: Rat
rat.simple: [curious] I'm a Rat. Rats are excellent swimmers, can hold their breath for 3 minutes, and laugh when tickled.

jerboa.name: Jerboa
jerboa.simple: [curious] I'm a Jerboa. Jerboas can hop 3 meters high and use their tail for balance.

polar_bear.name: Polar Bear
polar_bear.simple: [curious] I'm a Polar Bear. Polar bears have black skin under their white fur to absorb heat.

arctic_fox.name: Arctic Fox
arctic_fox.simple: [thoughtful] I'm an Arctic Fox. Arctic foxes change color - white in winter, brown or gray in summer.

arctic_wolf.name: Arctic Wolf
arctic_wolf.simple: [excited] I'm an Arctic Wolf. Arctic wolves can survive temperatures of -70°C and have two layers of fur.

arctic_hare.name: Arctic Hare
arctic_hare.simple: [excited] I'm an Arctic Hare. Arctic hares can run up to 60 km/h and change from brown to white for winter.

walrus.name: Walrus
walrus.simple: [excited] I'm a Walrus. Walruses use their tusks to haul out of water and can weigh up to 1,500 kg.

narwhal.name: Narwhal
narwhal.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Narwhal. Narwhals have a 3-meter long tooth that looks like a unicorn horn.

beluga_whale.name: Beluga Whale
beluga_whale.simple: [curious] I'm a Beluga Whale. Beluga whales can change the shape of their forehead and are called 'canaries of the sea' for their songs.

bowhead_whale.name: Bowhead Whale
bowhead_whale.simple: [excited] I'm a Bowhead Whale. Bowhead whales can live over 200 years, making them the longest-living mammals.

orca.name: Orca
orca.simple: [excited] I'm an Orca. Orcas are actually dolphins and each pod has its own unique dialect.

harp_seal.name: Harp Seal
harp_seal.simple: [excited] I'm a Harp Seal. I pups can swim within minutes of birth and have pure white fur for the first few weeks.

leopard_seal.name: Leopard Seal
leopard_seal.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Leopard Seal. Leopard seals are the only seals that eat warm-blooded prey like penguins.

weddell_seal.name: Weddell Seal
weddell_seal.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Weddell Seal. Weddell seals can dive to 600 meters and use their teeth to chew holes in ice to breathe.

emperor_penguin.name: Emperor Penguin
emperor_penguin.simple: [excited] I'm an Emperor Penguin. Emperor penguins can dive to 500 meters and males incubate eggs on their feet for 64 days.

adelie_penguin.name: Adelie Penguin
adelie_penguin.simple: [excited] I'm an Adelie Penguin. Adelie penguins use pebbles to build nests and will steal them from each other.

rockhopper_penguin.name: Rockhopper Penguin
rockhopper_penguin.simple: [curious] I'm a Rockhopper Penguin. Rockhopper penguins have spiky feathers on their heads and can jump 2.

puffin.name: Puffin
puffin.simple: [curious] I'm a Puffin. Puffins can hold up to 10 fish in their beak at once.

snowy_owl.name: Snowy Owl
snowy_owl.simple: [excited] I'm a Snowy Owl. Snowy owls have feathers on their feet like snowshoes and hunt 24 hours a day in summer.

musk_ox.name: Musk Ox
musk_ox.simple: [curious] I'm a Musk Ox. Musk oxen have underwool that's 8 times warmer than sheep's wool.

reindeer.name: Reindeer
reindeer.simple: [curious] I'm a Reindeer. I are the only deer species where both males and females have antlers.

caribou.name: Caribou
caribou.simple: [curious] I'm a Caribou. I can travel 5,000 km per year - the longest land migration of any animal.

lemming.name: Lemming
lemming.simple: [excited] I'm a Lemming. Contrary to myth, lemmings don't commit mass suicide - they migrate when populations get too high.

ptarmigan.name: Ptarmigan
ptarmigan.simple: [curious] I'm a Ptarmigan. Ptarmigans have feathered feet that act like snowshoes and change color with seasons.

wolverine.name: Wolverine
wolverine.simple: [curious] I'm a Wolverine. Wolverines can take down prey 10 times their size and have teeth strong enough to break bones.

stoat.name: Stoat
stoat.simple: [curious] I'm a Stoat. Stoats turn white in winter and perform hypnotic dances to mesmerize rabbits.

ermine.name: Ermine
ermine.simple: [excited] I'm an Ermine. Ermines are stoats in their white winter coat and were once used to make royal robes.

snow_goose.name: Snow Goose
snow_goose.simple: [thoughtful] I'm a Snow Goose. Snow geese fly in formation that saves 70% energy for birds behind the leader.

albatross.name: Albatross
albatross.simple: [thoughtful] I'm an Albatross. Albatrosses can fly for hours without flapping their wings and can sleep while flying.

krill_antarctic.name: Krill (Antarctic)
krill_antarctic.simple: [curious] I'm a Krill (Antarctic). Antarctic krill can live for 10 years and use their bodies as a solar panel by eating ice algae.
